description: Gets the fields of study that a given author has written papers in.
docstring:
The author_fields_of_study query traverses from an Author Vertex to FieldOfStudy Vertices through the Papers that the particular Author has written.
To run the query, use `runInstalledQuery('author_fields_of_study', params={'auth_id': AUTHOR_ID_HERE})`
Replace `AUTHOR_ID_HERE` with the appropriate author id mentioned in the question.
